mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence that best represents the reported speech: You said to your father, Please grant him leave for some time.

options.a: You told your father to let him leave for a short while.
options.b: You advised your father to grant him leave for some time.
options.c: You requested your father to grant him leave for some time.
options.d: You said to your father to grant you leave for some time.
